work.name: Dodo Engineering
work.summary: Dodo Pizza is the largest pizza company in Russia with own developed information system includes ERP, HRM and CRP systems. Being a part of the mobile team I am responsible for planning and integrating new features into the mobile app
highlights: Being a part of core billing team integrated App2App payment schema into all products of Dodo Brands (Dodo Pizza, Doner42, DrinkIt) such as SberPay (Russia), KaspiPay (Kazakhstan), MomoPay (Vietnam) that increased revenue more than 10% for all franchising partners

work.name: Dodo Engineering
work.position: Software Engineer (Android), feature team, part-time core team
work.summary: Dodo Pizza is the largest pizza company in Russia with own developed information system includes ERP, HRM and CRP systems. Being a part of the mobile team I am responsible for planning and integrating new features into the mobile app
highlights: Developed new order mechanism for cart domain of the app
Integrated A/B tests with Firebase and created in-app service for testing product hypotheses all over the app
Redesigned menu and prole screens for measuring influence
Redesigned currency logic in the app under the hood
Developed new "combo constructor" feature which increased combo meals rating twice and every third order in the mobile app is combo-meal now
Extracted "cart", "persistence" and "common" parts into separate domain modules from monolith app structure and decreased build time more than 20 seconds
Implemented new analytics module into the app for more efficient obtaining user's interactions
Implemented core mechanism and API for writing E2E tests and also added E2E tests in android application and reduced regression testing time more than 50% from 7-10 days to 2-3 days

work.name: netmonet
work.summary: netmonet is a startup that allows customers to tip staff of the cafes, bars or barbershops by card. I have created Android application for waiters from scratch
highlights: Developed multi-module android app from scratch (30+ modules)
Decreased build-time from 1.5 minutes to 50 seconds after dividing on separate gradle modules
Implemented Sms Consent API for better UX and reducing time spent on entering code from sms
Integrated Crashlytics into the app for monitoring and decreasing app's crashes
Integrated Firebase Remote Messaging and synchronizing it with backend for creating single push mechanism
Implemented CI/CD mechanism with Circle CI service for delivering actual artifacts to QA staff
Took part in app designing and implemented Material design patterns for better UI/UX

work.name: Manufactura Soft
work.summary: Manufactura Soft is outsource company with strong mobile and design experience. Top-25 of Mobile Studios inRussia in 2019 by Tagline agency. At Manufactura Soft I've supported existing applications (rewriting legacy code and logic, also developing new features). Also I am taking part in creating new mobile solutions and in designing new application's architecture. Worked with customers from Germany (Axel Springer: Stadtmeister app, TalentHero app)
highlights: Implemented variative onboarding feature for multiple apps' screens
Planned all features in close communication with backend developers, designers and customers
Integrated A/B tests with own backend in projects which increased user's conversion on 9.5 percent
Refactored legacy code from Java to Kotlin and decreased existing project's codebase

work.name: RELEX Inc.
work.summary: RELEX - it is an outsource IT company with customers all over the world. During my work in RELEX I took part in projects from US customers. The main project was like a social network for cafe/bar-visitors and after visiting they could estimate impression for visited place. Besides the project I've finished two presale projects from scratch and helped company to sign the contracts
highlights: Developed applications from scratch
Implemented Maps and used Google Maps API, Google Places API
Supported different types of screens such as tablets and large phones
